private_information: Can only interact with blocks labeled with vowels (A, O).
agent1.goal: Reconfigure blocks A and O according to the target configuration.

private_information: Can only interact with blocks labeled with consonants (B, C).
agent2.goal: Reconfigure blocks B and C according to the target configuration.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate the actions of agent1 and agent2 to achieve the target block configuration.

public_information: Both agents can only manipulate the top block of any stack.
Each agent can only move one block at a time.

agent1.system_prompt: You are an expert in PDDL for block manipulation. You always provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> tags, and the problem in <problem></problem> tags.
agent1.prompt: Your name is agent1. You can only interact with blocks labeled with vowels (A, O). Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your personal constraints: {agents->agent_details->agent1->private_information}. Goal: {agents->agent_details->agent1->goal}. Think step by step and provide a PDDL domain and problem that encode the block manipulation plan. Do not make assumptions beyond the given information.

agent2.system_prompt: You are an expert in PDDL for block manipulation. You always provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> tags, and the problem in <problem></problem> tags.
agent2.prompt: Your name is agent2. You can only interact with blocks labeled with consonants (B, C). Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your personal constraints: {agents->agent_details->agent2->private_information}. Goal: {agents->agent_details->agent2->goal}. Think step by step and provide a PDDL domain and problem that encode the block manipulation plan. Do not make assumptions beyond the given information.

orchestrator.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent PDDL planning. You always provide a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file to solve the task. Keep the actions distinct and respect the given constraints. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> tags, and the problem in <problem></problem> tags.
orchestrator.prompt: You receive the PDDL from agent1 and agent2. Your task is to orchestrate the constraints and goals into a feasible block manipulation plan. Ensure all constraints and rules are respected.
